system.description: A fragmentation grenade hurls shrapnel in all directions. one target and 1d4 random targets. On a failed throw, all 5 are random. All targets takes 4d6 damage. A creature that gets a success on an Agility challenge roll takes half the damage.
system.enrichedDescription: A fragmentation grenade hurls shrapnel in all directions. one target and [[/roll 1d4]] random targets. On a failed throw, all 5 are random. All targets takes [[/roll 4d6]] damage. A creature that gets a success on an Agility challenge roll takes half the damage.
